data.text: @NielsANielsen @Gab_H_R Especially since this graph is on a logarithmic scale!! Plot this linear and scare the heck out of people.

@Gab_H_R misclassified
Two errors
Omicron is not the next variant in step ladder mutation. It spent 18 months mutating in a new zoonotic host pool.
Omicron is a biphasic vascular disease, SAVS not SARS.
Thought of this way, data fits.
Phase 2 = with-covid.
LC is post viral synd. like CFS.
@Gab_H_R The waste water data is more in line with hospitalisations and deaths than are case numbers. https://t.co/D1F63W6eBn
@CBroendsholmA @Gab_H_R And fewer and fewer PCR evey day.  Instead of acting to fight the  virus we're acting to hide it. And a large majotity of  the population  doesn't care at all. So depressing !
@Gab_H_R 🇩🇰Today free antigen/LTF tests are not available anymore in Denmark . All ltf test sites closed Yesterday🤷🏼‍♀️
@Gab_H_R @ChristosArgyrop @aleksj this is an excellent reply to Christos, @Gab_H_R 😂😂😂 and great thread
@Gab_H_R It may be a respiratory virus going in, but it's hellish for causing vascular damage once it's there. I still hate this virus.
